desc: CoFactor formulates, develops, and manufactures personal care, cosmetic, and topical therapeutic products across a wide range of CPG markets, specializing in turnkey solutions with low minimum order quantities and short lead times.

layout.text: Creating products that build brands and enhance lives

CoFactor formulates, develops, and manufactures personal care, cosmetic, and topical therapeutic products across a wide range of CPG markets, specializing in turnkey solutions with low minimum order quantities and short lead times.
